title: House to vote on sending Trump impeachment articles to Senate
content: Cracks are exposed in Republican ranks over whether to allow witnesses in the Senate proceedings.

title: Burundi: More than 4,000 mass graves uncovered
content: The Truth and Reconciliation Commission identifies 142,505 victims of Burundi's conflicts since 1962.

title: Iran nuclear deal: European powers trigger dispute mechanism
content: Fears for the future of the accord grow as the UK, France and Germany complain of Iranian breaches.

title: US man breaks record for completing marathon in an exoskeleton
content: Despite being paralysed from the neck down, Adam Gorlitsky finished the Charleston Marathon in 33 hours, 16 minutes and 28 seconds.

title: Lesotho PM's wife wanted over death of his ex-wife
content: Maesaiah Thabane is wanted for questioning over the 2017 murder of the PM's then-estranged wife.

title: Retired Pope to be removed as celibacy book author
content: The apparent intervention from Pope Benedict came as Pope Francis considers an easing of the rules.

title: Chinese student Wu Huayan dies after living on pennies a day
content: Wu Huayan sacrificed her own health in order to make sure her brother could get medical treatment.

title: Iran plane downing: 'Several people detained' over airliner loss
content: The detentions came as part of an investigation into the incident, which killed all 176 on board.

title: Wuhan pneumonia outbreak: First case reported outside China
content: The outbreak of the virus, which is from the same family as Sars, began in Wuhan in December.

title: Peter Madsen: Russian artist marries Danish submarine killer
content: A Russian artist defends her marriage to Peter Madsen, jailed for murdering journalist Kim Wall.
